about_the_game:
Upon abandoning your previous life, you find your past has finally caught up to you. Your world has gone dark, and you aren't alone. As a dark threat emerges, you find yourself cornered at an abandoned prison facility as you take refuge inside. You must use your eyes to navigate across dark environments and uncover the truth of the Meyer City Prison. You can't escape your inner demons.

Your end is near.

Don't be afraid of the dark

Play through a 30+ minute single-player 2-D retro horror story, exploring a mostly dark world. Use your eyes as a tool to navigate through the darkness.

Hunted

As a dark entity targets the player, little defense is provided. The player must run, hide, die, or find another means of survival.

Choose your path

Exploration is inviting to players who seek different story events.


This experience is filled with a dark atmosphere throughout its terrifying world. Flashing lights and loud noises will are also included. Play at your own risk.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains cartoon violence/ gore, weapon violence, death, and suicide.

name: Blackout: Director's Cut

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or better
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.00GHz or better
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6100 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 83 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or beter
  • Processor: Intel Celeron G1101 @ 2.27GHz or AMD A4-5300B APU or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RADEON A9800XT, NVIDIA GeForce 940A, or AMD Radeon R9 A375 and better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 83 MB available space
